Process

class entity.base.process.Process(name: str, *, template: ClassVar[Union[ProcessTemplate, MeasurementTemplate]] = None, notes: Optional[str] = None, conditions: Optional[list[gemd.entity.attribute.condition.Condition]] = None, parameters: Optional[list[gemd.entity.attribute.parameter.Parameter]] = None, which: Literal['spec', 'run', 'both'] = 'spec')

Bases: ProcessOrMeasurement

Base class for processes.

property spec: ProcessSpec

The underlying process spec.

property run: ProcessRun

The underlying process run.

classmethod from_spec_or_run(name: str, *, notes: Optional[str] = None, spec: Optional[ProcessSpec] = None, run: Optional[ProcessRun] = None) → Process

Instantiate a Process from a spec or run with appropriate validation.

Note that the spec’s template will be set to the class template, and the run’s spec will be set to this spec.
